select
,d.label as positive_name_dict from tab_pb_positives p left join sys_dict d on d.id = p.positive_name where p.positive_id = #{positiveId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

,d.label as positive_name_dict from tab_pb_positives p left join sys_dict d on d.id = p.positive_name where p.positive_id = #{positiveId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select , p.positive_name,p.positive_id,d.label AS positive_name_dict from tab_pb_positives p join sys_dict d on p.positive_name = d.id and d.type='DNZW' where p.del_flag = 0 and p.user_id = #{userId}

where positive_id = #{positiveId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update.foreach:
update tab_pb_positives
del_flag = 1,
update_time = #{item.updateTime},
update_userid = #{item.updateUserid},
update_username = #{item.updateUsername},
where positive_id = #{item.positiveId}

mapper.select: select positive_id, user_id, positive_type, positive_org_id, positive_org, positive_name, positive_level, positive_start, positive_finished, order_num, description, left_type from tab_pb_positives where user_id=#{userId} and del_flag=0
